src_original: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
jaravyādhidukhair hatatejavapuṃ vijahanti mṛgā iva śuṣkanadīm //
dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī /
parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm //
yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ /
dhanahīnu jarārditu yācanako bhavate tada apriyagṛdhrasamaḥ //
jarāvyādhidukhārditu kṣīṇadhano bhavate tada apriyamṛtyusamaḥ //  jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati /  jarajīrṇa agāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune //
